{"id":1253115083,"question_id":3276,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"9Â months","timestamp":1715220057,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"63 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1253115083/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Pushes to Type Word II","memory":"27.4 MB","code":"class Solution { //https://leetcode.com/problems/minimum-number-of-pushes-to-type-word-ii/solutions/4600654/simple-c-o-n-solution-frequency/\npublic:\n    int minimumPushes(string word) {\n        //calculate frequency\n        vector<int> f(26);\n        for(auto &w:word)\n            f[w-'a']++;\n        sort(f.rbegin(), f.rend());  //sort in descending order\n        vector<int> position(8,8);\n        int ans = 0;\n\n        for(int i=0, j=0; i<26; i++) {\n            if(f[i]) {\n                ans += f[i]*(j+1); //max frequency, min position\n                if(--position[j] == 0) { // if jth position is not available then go for next position at place 8 letters\n                     j++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-pushes-to-type-word-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
